solution_line_template: {nights_sleep_6_hours} nights a week she sleeps for {hours_sleep_weekday} hours so she sleeps {nights_sleep_6_hours}*{hours_sleep_weekday} = <<{nights_sleep_6_hours}*{hours_sleep_weekday}={hours_from_weekday_sleep}>>{hours_from_weekday_sleep} hours

{nights_sleep_9_hours} nights a week she sleeps for {hours_sleep_weekend_night} hours so she sleeps {nights_sleep_9_hours}*{hours_sleep_weekend_night} = <<{nights_sleep_9_hours}*{hours_sleep_weekend_night}={hours_from_weekend_night_sleep}>>{hours_from_weekend_night_sleep} hours
{days_nap} days a week she naps for {hours_nap_per_day} hour so she sleeps {days_nap}*{hours_nap_per_day} = <<{days_nap}*{hours_nap_per_day}={hours_from_nap}>>{hours_from_nap} hours
